description: Frontend development of multiple web applications for Orange and Telefónica using: ReactJS, JavaScript, Typescript, HTML, CSS, and Vue.
Developed multiple backend applications using Node.js, Flask, and PostgreSQL.
Product design using Figma.
Use of CSS preprocessor SASS
Built using Docker in both development and production environments.
Deploy applications using Nginx & Docker.
Task and code version control using Git, Jira, and Bitbucket
Develop and maintain documentation for both projects and deployments.
Proficient in Bash scripting.
Full-stack development of multiple web applications for Banco Santander using HTML, CSS, Javascript, Jquery, Node, or Django.
Developing documentation for all projects.
Worked on the migration of legacy applications using component-based software such as React, Angular, and Vue, with a focus on React.
Version control with Gitlab.
Built applications using Docker.
Proficient in Bash scripting.
